publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7524 Mike Pringle: Edinburgh’s Bus Drivers Keep the City Moving—That the Parliament applauds the skill and dedication of Edinburgh’s bus drivers who continue to keep the city moving despite what it considers to be exceptionally heavy snow, freezing temperatures and hazardous road conditions, and believes that, without them, the city of Edinburgh would be at a virtual standstill.

S3M-7524 Mike Pringle: Edinburgh’s Bus Drivers Keep the City Moving—That the Parliament applauds the skill and dedication of Edinburgh’s bus drivers who continue to keep the city moving despite what it considers to be exceptionally heavy snow, freezing temperatures and hazardous road conditions, and believes that, without them, the city of Edinburgh would be at a virtual standstill. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Nanette Milne*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Margaret Smith*, Aileen Campbell*, Elizabeth Smith*, Cathy Peattie*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-7524 Edinburgh’s Bus Drivers Keep the City Moving (lodged on 1 December 2010) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-7524 Edinburgh’s Bus Drivers Keep the City Moving (lodged on 1 December 2010) Gil Paterson*
